Moderation Commands.purge:
Clears messages in chat. Number of messages has to be mentioned.
 Format - `>purge <Number of messages>`
  Aliases - `clear`
Moderation Commands.warn:
Warns member. Warning will be sent in DMs.
 Format - `>warn <member> <reason>`
Moderation Commands.kick:
Kicks the specified member.
 Format - `>kick <member mention> <reason(Default = 'Not Provided')>`
Moderation Commands.mute:
Mutes the specified member.
 Format - `>mute <member mention>`
Moderation Commands.unmute:
unmutes the specified member.
 Format - `>unmute <member mention>`
Moderation Commands.ban:
Bans the specified member.
 Format - `>ban <member mention> <reason(Default = 'Not Provided')>`
Moderation Commands.unban:
Unbans the specified user.
 Format - `>unban <member>`
 Member's discriminator should be mentioned

Commands.avatar:
Returns the avatar of a user if mentioned else returns the avatar of the command user.
 Format - `>avatar <member_mention>`
Commands.newmeet: Generates a google meet link and returns it
Commands.suggest: Can be used to suggest something. Adds a ğŸ‘,ğŸ‘ reaction to the message
Commands.userinfo:
Return information about a specified user
 Format - `>userinfo <member mention>`

Tags.tag:
Returns the tag's content
 Format - `>tag <name of the tag>`
Tags.newtag:
Creates a new tag
 Format - `>newtag <name> <content>
 Names can only be a single word
Tags.taginfo:
Returns info about the tag
 Format - `>taginfo <name>`
